00008 modules::navigator::navigator():fModulesLoaded(false),fModulesMade(false),fDebug(false),fOutFile(NULL){};

00010 int modules::navigator::LoadConfigFile(const char* filename){
00011     // Check we haven't already opened a modules file
00012     if(fModulesLoaded ) {
00013             cout<<"Error: Loading a new modules file, when one was already loaded"<<endl;
00014             return 1;
00015     }
00016     // Read in the file and dump the processed options
00017     int retVal=fModulesFile.ReadFile(filename);
00018     if(retVal!=0) return retVal;
00019 
00020     // Check the file contained at least one module
00021     size_t num_modules=fModulesFile.GetNumModules();
00022     if(num_modules==0){
00023             cout<<"Warning: No modules were requested for use, so there's nothing to be done!"<<endl;
00024             return 2;
00025     }
00026     cout<<"Number of modules requested: "<<num_modules<<endl;
00027 
00028     // Everything finished ok
00029     fModulesLoaded=true;
00030     return 0;
00031 }

00033 int modules::navigator::MakeModules(){
00034     // Check we've been given a valid output file
00035     if(! (fOutFile && fOutFile->IsWritable()) ){
00036             cout<<"Error: Output file is not useable"<<endl;
00037             return 1;
00038     }
00039 
00040     // Check that we've already opened a modules file
00041     if(!fModulesLoaded) {
00042             cout<<"Error: MakeModules(): Cannot make modules until you load a Modules file."<<endl;
00043             return 1;
00044     }
00045 
00046     // Check that we've not already called this method
00047     if(fModulesMade) {
00048             cout<<"Error: MakeModules(): You've already called MakeModules."<<endl;
00049             return 1;
00050     }
00051 
00052     // Loop over each requested module and build it
00053     // If we have any problems making a module then stop running
00054     modules::factory* mgr = modules::factory::Instance();
00055     std::string name;
00056     modules::options* opts;
00057     BaseModule* mod=NULL;
00058     size_t num_modules=fModulesFile.GetNumModules();
00059     for(unsigned i=0;i<num_modules;i++){
00060             name = fModulesFile.GetModule(i);
00061             opts =  fModulesFile.GetOptions(i);
00062         if(mgr->canCreate(name)){
00063             if(Debug()){
00064                 cout<<"Creating module: "<<name<<endl;
00065                 cout<<"With options:"<<endl;
00066                 opts->DumpOptions("  ");
00067             }
00068             gDirectory->cd("/");
00069             mod = mgr->createModule(name,opts);
00070             gDirectory->cd("/");
00071             if(mod){
00072                 AddModule(name, mod);
00073             }
00074             else return 3;
00075         }else {
00076             std::cout<<"Unknown module requested: "<<name<<std::endl;
00077             return 4;
00078         }
00079     }
00080 
00081     // Everything finished ok
00082     fModulesMade=true;
00083     return 0;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void modules::navigator::AddModule(const std::string& name, BaseModule* mod){
00087     fModules.push_back(std::make_pair(name,mod));
00088     fModulesSearch.insert(std::make_pair(name,mod));
00089 }
00090 
00091 int modules::navigator::HowMany(const std::string& name)const{
00092     if(fModulesMade) return fModulesSearch.count(name);
00093     return fModulesFile.HowMany(name);
00094 }
